main_definition: In the near future, or in a short period of time.

meanings_and_examples.example: I need to finish this project soon, or I won't meet the deadline.
The bus will arrive in just a few minutes, so you don't have to wait too long.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to or occurring shortly after an event or action
meanings_and_examples.example: We should order more supplies soon since we're running low.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period that is close but not precisely defined
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll see you soon, whenever works best for you!
